Yanhe () is a Chinese Vocaloid developed formerly by Bplats, Inc. under the Yamaha Corporation, and was created in collaboration with Shanghai Henian Information Technology Co. Ltd. She was released for the Vocaloid 3 and Vocaloid 5 engines. Her voice is provided by Chinese voice actress Seira RyÅ«. It was announced on the 9th Chinese International Cartoon and Game Expo (CCG) on July 11, 2013. She is the second Vocaloid Chinese singer character, following Luo Tianyi.

* List of Vocaloid products
